alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued November 29 at 3:46AM EST until December 01 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding possible. * WHERE...Lake Ontario shore of Oswego and Jefferson counties. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The combination of onshore flow and significant wave action may result in minor lakeshore flooding along the immediate lakeshore, especially in bays, inlets, harbors, and other low lying areas along the shoreline. Shoreline erosion is also possible.
info.instruction: A Lakeshore Flood Watch means that conditions favorable for lakeshore flooding are expected to develop. Residents on or near the shore should take action to protect property, and listen to local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for later statements or warnings.
